effect_size: Large for disease activity (d=1.08) and cytokines (d=0.92 for TNF-α)
participants: 88 adults with RA (inadequate response to methotrexate)
notes: Cannabidiol Effects on Inflammatory Cytokines in Rheumatoid Arthritis: Mechanistic RCT
abstract: CBD+MTX: TNF-α reduced 44%, IL-6 reduced 38%, IL-1β reduced 41%; DAS28-ESR reduced 42%; MTX alone: cytokines reduced 12%, DAS28-ESR reduced 18%
